text: Juan Roberto Redon (born 26 November 1950) is a Mexican equestrian. He competed at the 1976 Summer Olympics and the 1984 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Mexico Category:Equestrians at the 1976 Summer Olympics Category:Equestrians at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Juan Roberto Redon
